transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Bolye.
Executive: Uh, sir, very good morning. Mai Shreya baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART head office se. Abdul ji baat kar rahe hai?
Customer: Ji, ji, ji.
Executive: Sir, actually aapke yaha ek concern raise hua tha. Aapne like aapke account manager se baat hui thi aur aapne not satisfied feedback de diya tha sir. Mai jaan sakti hu kya problem face kar rahe hai aap?
Customer: Koi productive improvement nahi hai. Vaisa hi ka vaisa hi hai bas.
Executive: Accha. Samajh like sir, inko matlab buyleads vagera toh aap use kar rahe ho. Thik hai. But matlab aa nahi raha hai idhar kuch. Hai nahi sir, state wise kuch nahi hai.
Customer: Jo aapka mera Jharkhand, Bihar, Bengal, Odisha, ye chaar aas paas ke state se dikhta hi nahi.
Executive: All over India deal karte hai ya Bihar side hi deal karte hai aap?
Customer: Bas yahi chaar state. Jharkhand, Bihar, Bengal, Odisha.
Executive: Bihar side hi deal.
Customer: Ha, agar kahi hoga toh jayenge. Kahi hota nahi na.
Customer: Koi milta hi nahi na.
Executive: Sir, mai aap filter laga ke buyleads purchase karte ho kya? Kyuki mai dekh pa rahi hu aapke portal pe buyleads vagera kafi matlab hai Bihar se related, Bihar ke matlab Bihar side se hai buyleads. Aap woh filter laga ke use karte ho aap sir?
Customer: Filter lagate hai, milta nahi hai toh. Buyleads unko toh distributor level pe aadmi chahiye na.
Customer: Toh koi khaas ab tak jo hai na improvement nahi hai.
Executive: Thik hai, mai ispe ye karti hu. Jaise ki maine na abhi Bihar ka filter lagaya sir, thik hai. Maine ye Bihar ka filter laga diya. Toh mai dekh rahi hu ki Patna, Bihar se hai aur matlab agar sir dekho abhi chaar se paanch lead dikh rahi hai, thik hai. Yahi lead aap agar consume karte ho na, toh apni is lead ki flow na badh jati hai sir.
Executive: Thik hai. Agar vahi hai ki leads vagera pe zyada consume karo kyuki active kafi kam ho aap aur queries bhi aati hai. Lead manager me inquiries bhi aati hai. Waha se bhi aap follow kar sakte hai. Jaise 26, 29 October ko maine Jamshedpur ki ek lead dekhi hu. 50 piece ki hai aur order value 26,000 to 30, 32,000 ki hai. Toh agar aise queries pe agar aap follow karte ho, reply karte ho, buyleads time se agar buy karte ho, thik hai. Toh apni lead ki flow bhi vaise badhegi aur fir yaha se aapko Bihar side se bhi zyada milenge.
Customer: Karte hai filter. Us samay nahi milta hai shayad.
Customer: Jab humko chahiye us samay nahi milta hoga. Khatam ho jata hoga.
Executive: Kaise use karte hai? Laptop pe use karte hai ya mobile phone pe?
Customer: Mobile, mobile. Itna laptop chalte firte mobile me chal dete hai.
Executive: Vahi. Sir, agar mobile se use karte hai toh aapke liye bahut accha hai ki aap kabhi bhi jaise like WhatsApp, Instagram, IndiaMART app open kar sakte ho. Woh buyleads ki notification bhi aati hai sir, inquiries ki bhi notification aati hai. Aap vaha se use kar sakte ho kyuki mai aapki jo activity dekh rahi hu IndiaMART pe kafi kam hai woh, thik hai. Aap pehle se aapko kuch isme se buy karte hai aap vaise karo, aap vaise bhi use karo. Toh aapko benefit milega.
Customer: Thik hai, thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai. Toh aap vaise na buyleads, aap jab buyleads use karte ho sir, morning morning buyleads dekho ya fir Sunday ko bhi aapko fresh buyleads mil jate hai. Us din bhi aap filter laga ke chal aap Bihar ke filter lagao fir Jamshedpur ke filter laga dekh pa rahi hu ki aapki jo GST me aapke address jo hai woh Jamshedpur updated hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Thik hai. Aap buyleads ki tab pe jaoge then filter lagaoge, thik hai.
Executive: Jamshedpur ya Bihar se aapko sari buyleads do, teen, chaar bhi agar aapko buyleads dikh rahi hai na sir, toh aap unko consume karo aur consume karke buyer se baat karo aap.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Ye cheez karo aur sir then, then dusra option hota hai lead manager. Lead manager me vaha se jaise hi open karoge vaha pe direct inquiries hoti hai customer ki.
Customer: Accha, mai baad me baat kar sakta hu madam. Thoda kuch kaam hai, busy hai.
Executive: Accha, thik hai. Ye number aapka hai na? Second hum baat karte hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi, mai aapko na isi aapke number pe na WhatsApp pe hi kar deti hu aur aap mujhe kabhi bhi call kar sakte ho. Mai lead meeting pe aapko samjha dungi. Baki ye mai concern close kar rahi hu sir, thik hai aapne toh.
Customer: Okay, okay, chaliye.
Executive: Yahi number hai na sir aapka WhatsApp pe? Ha, yahi number hai. Ha, thik hai.
Executive: Mai aapko WhatsApp pe guide kar dungi sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting productive improvement on IndiaMART.

- Not getting state-wise buyleads.

- Wants distributor level leads.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to use filters.

- Executive explained benefits of using mobile app.

- Executive explained about lead manager.

- Executive offered to guide on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send a 'Hi' on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, filter, mobile app, lead manager
